metadata.name: App Granted Privileged Delegated Or App Permissions
metadata.comment: Detects when administrator grants either application permissions (app roles) or highly privileged delegated permissions

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM account_change WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(message) = lower('add app role assignment to service principal'))

output.summary: Detects when administrator grants either application permissions (app roles) or highly privileged delegated permissions

metadata.objective: False positive: When the permission is legitimately needed for the app Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/architecture/security-operations-applications#application-granted-highly-privileged-permissions
